mapper.insert: insert into sf_message_sr_relation (id, create_time, sf_message_content_id, from_user, to_user, status, is_see, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sfMessageContentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fromUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{toUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sf_message_sr_relation set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sf_message_content_id = #{sfMessageContentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, from_user = #{fromUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, to_user = #{toUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_see = #{isSee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, sf_message_content_id, from_user, to_user, status, is_see, remark from sf_message_sr_relation where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, create_time, sf_message_content_id, from_user, to_user, status, is_see, remark from sf_message_sr_relation
